name: Non-pharmacologic interventions for opioid use disorder
description: Peer-reviewed publications - scoping review of non-pharmacologic interventions for opioid use disorder (OUD)

citation.text: Wild, T.C., Hammal, F., Hancock, M., Bartlett, N.B., Kaiser Gladwin, K., Adams, D., Loverock, A., Hodgins, D.C. (2021). Forty-eight years of research on psychosocial interventions in the treatment of opioid use disorder: A scoping review. Drug and Alcohol Dependence. 218.
